arts.ttl: Preview: Reims vs. Paris Saint-Germain - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Ligue 1 clash between Reims and Paris Saint-Germain, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: ‘A While’ – Arsenal’s Arteta Gives Injury Update on Star Player Ahead of Looming PSG Clash
arts.sum: In the coming weeks, one of Paris Saint-Germain’s marquee matches will be their UEFA Champions League clash against Arsenal on October 1 at Emirates Stadium. However, the Gunners will be down one star player when the Parisians travel to North London. arts.ttl: ‘Ongoing Issue’ – PSG Star’s Barcelona Troubles Persist in Champions League Win vs. Girona
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé has started the 2024-25 season in outstanding form, with three goals and two assists in just four Ligue 1 games. However, the 27-year-old winger had a challenging night in Paris Saint-Germain’s opening Matchday 1 contest against Girona FC. Dembélé had eight total shits, with two going on target and one hitting the woodwork. arts.ttl: Man Utd, PSG Target Posts Impressive UCL Stat on Matchday 1 for Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Bayern Munich standout Jamal Musiala is drawing interest from other top European clubs. The 21-year-old’s contract with the Bavarian side expires in 2026 and on Tuesday, the youngster showed why he’s drawing so much interest. arts.ttl: Tottenham Emerge as Most Interested Over Chelsea, PSG for Player with 52 Goals Since 2023
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain opted not to pursue a No. 9 this past summer window, giving Randal Kolo Muani and Gonçalo Ramos a vote of confidence. However, if neither player solidifies themselves as the starting striker, could the Parisians be in the market next summer? arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano Provides Key Contract Update on Arsenal Defender’s Future as PSG Show Interest
arts.sum: Arsenal’s central defensive pairing, William Saliba and Gabriel Magalhães, are reportedly on Paris Saint-Germain’s radar. Transfer expert Fabrizio Romano has the latest on the Brazilian defender, who has experience in Ligue 1. TBR Football recently revealed that PSG had a representative scouting Gabriel and Saliba. arts.ttl: 'Unknowns' in new UCL worry PSG's Luis Enrique
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain manager Luis Enrique said the "unknowns" of the new Champions League format make it hard to judge his team's opening win over Girona on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: PSG Show ‘Most Concrete Interest’ in Barcelona Transfer Target, According to Fabrizio Romano
arts.sum: Bayern Munich veteran Joshua Kimmich has been on FC Bayern Munich and Paris Saint-Germain’s radar. However, in recent days, there’s been chatter about his future. Sky Sport Germany’s Florian Plettenberg recently shared that Kimmich is open to discussing a contract extension with Bayern Munich beyond 2025. Furthermore, Barcelona and PSG have faced some setbacks in securing the player. arts.ttl: Arsenal, Liverpool 'scout' Girona duo in Champions League opener
arts.sum: Arsenal and Liverpool reportedly send scouts to watch two Girona players in Wednesday's Champions League clash with Paris Saint-Germain.

arts.ttl: Girona star left in tears after setting unwanted UCL record in heartbreaking PSG defeat
arts.sum: Girona star Paulo Gazzaniga on Wednesday night secured for himself a place in the history books of Spanish football. Unfortunately for the shot-stopper, however, as much came for altogether less…
